name: egao
description: A CSS library to create kaomoji.

scripts.build: npm run build:ts && npm run build:css
scripts.watch:sync: onchange "dist/egao.css" -- "npm run sync-docs-data && npm run sync-docs-css"
scripts.sync-docs-css: cp dist/egao.css website/static/css/egao.css && cp dist/egao.css website/src/css/egao.module.css
scripts.dev: npm run build && concurrently --kill-others "npm run docs:dev" --kill-others "npm run watch:ts" --kill-others "npm run watch:css" --kill-others "npm run watch:sync"
scripts.docs:dev: npm run build && cd website && npm start

author: OrangeII (https://github.com/OrangeII)
